DOC.brief_summary: Acute kidney injury cardiac surgery report increase morbidity mortality . Several risk score model prediction aortic kidney injury cardiac surgery develop . However , predictive accuracy model stil unclear . The aim study evaluate accuracy four pre-existing prediction model use gray zone approach patient underwent aortic surgery institution .
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy Pre-existing Risk Scoring Models Predicting Acute Kidney Injury Patients Who Underwent Aortic Surgery Using Gray Zone Approach
DOC.detailed_description: Acute kidney injury cardiac surgery report increase morbidity mortality . Several risk score model prediction aortic kidney injury cardiac surgery develop . However , predictive accuracy model stil unclear . The aim study evaluate accuracy four pre-existing prediction model ( AKICS , Wijeysundera , Mehta , Thakar model ) use gray zone approach patient underwent aortic surgery institution . Based receiver operate characteristic ( ROC ) curve analysis , construct gray zone use cut-off value sensitivity < 90 % , specificity < 90 % ( diagnostic tolerance 10 % ) .
DOC.criteria: Those underwent elective emergency aortic surgery Samsung Medical Center 2004 2010. miss laboratory data preoperative hemodialysis death within 48 hour surgery
